text:
"Becoming queen made her more confident." [redacted_name] says while slightly smiling.
"So would you like the come and punch me right now?" [redacted_name] asks her. Their a silence for a minute as[redacted_name] and [redacted_name] just look at each other.
"No Sir!" [redacted_name] exclaims as she looks away.
"Wow treat your queen better [redacted_name]." [redacted_name] jokes as she nudges him.
"Did that hurt? Well I'm queen now, so too bad!" [redacted_name] says as she backs up. "If you have a probl-" suddenly she stops as she hears a chuckle come from [redacted_name]. They all gasp and look up in surprised.
"Thank. you guys. I needed that." [redacted_name] tells them as he smiles.
Their silence as everyone jaw hits the floor.
"Is the screen broken?" [redacted_name] questions.
"He smiled?" [redacted_name] says in shock.
"This doesn't feel normal." [redacted_name] states.
"I didn't even know that was possible." [redacted_name] says.
"[redacted_name] you should smile more!" Hange says as she shakes him.
"Stop it four eyes. I was definitely not expect that to be my reaction." [redacted_name] says surprised by his actions. I mustt've grown close to them. He thinks.
trans:
«Convertirse en reina la hizo más segura de sí misma». [redacted_name] dice mientras sonríe ligeramente.
«Entonces, ¿te gustaría venir y golpearme ahora mismo?» [redacted_name] le pregunta. Hay un minuto de silencio mientras [redacted_name] y [redacted_name] se miran.
«¡No, señor!» [redacted_name] exclama mientras mira hacia otro lado.
«Vaya, trata mejor a tu reina, [redacted_name]». [redacted_name] bromea mientras le da un codazo.
«¿Te ha dolido? Bueno, ahora soy la reina, ¡qué pena!». [redacted_name] dice mientras retrocede. «Si tienes un problema…», se detiene de repente al oír una risita de [redacted_name]. Todos lanzan un grito ahogado y miran sorprendidos.
«Gracias, chicos. Lo necesitaba». [redacted_name] les dice mientras sonríe.
Hacen silencio mientras todos quedan boquiabiertos.
«¿Está rota la pantalla?» Pregunta [redacted_name].
«¿Él sonrió?» [redacted_name] dice en estado de shock.
«Esto no parece normal», afirma [redacted_name].
«Ni siquiera sabía que era posible», [redacted_name] dice.
«[redacted_name] deberías sonreír más», dice Hange mientras le sacude.
«Para cuatro ojos. Definitivamente, no esperaba que esa fuera mi reacción», dice [redacted_name] sorprendido por sus acciones. Debo haberme encariñado con ellos. Él reflexiona.
